channel.title: Revision-X: The most unique server here!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/header.png[/img] [size=12pt][font=arial][b]WE JUST RE LAUNCHED ON OCT22, JOIN NOW AND GET A HEAD START![/b] [/font][/size] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/overview.png[/img] [size=12pt][font=arial] In the past custom content was rejected by RSPS players because of how poorly it was added, in Revision-X we have ended this and created professional new and custom content. Something very rare to see in modern private servers. We have integrated the new content with the old content to create a unique private server experience.
Revision-X features new items, abilities, maps, NPC's, and more. We have gone to great lengths to provide the best quality content possible for our players. We guarantee you will have never played a server quite like this one. [/font][/size]
[IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/links.png[/img] [size=12pt][font=arial] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/ICONS/home.png[/img][URL=http://www.revision-x.net/]Homepage[/URL] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/ICONS/play.png[/img][URL=http://www.revision-x.net/play]Webclient[/URL] [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/ICONS/play.png[/img][URL=http://www.revision-x.net/download]Download[/URL]
[IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/trailer.png[/img]
[URL=http://"http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zBufSGrSVz8"][IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/youtube.png[/img][/URL]
[/font][/size]
[IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/features.png[/img] [size=12pt][font=arial] [color=green]?[/color] Flawless combat system with all the new items supported [color=green]?[/color] Epic economy 100% dupe free, tons of balanced shops [color=green]?[/color] All skills working 100%, able to make money with most skills! [color=green]?[/color] Unique gameframe(optional!) created specially for Revision-X [color=green]?[/color] Custom bosses with special effects you need a team to kill! [color=green]?[/color] Supportive staff and drop parties for special occasions! [color=green]?[/color] We add all the newest Runescape content as soon as possible! [color=green]?[/color] Frequent updates and we make sure our players are happy! [color=green]?[/color] [B]WE ARE A NEWER SERVER, WE NEED STAFF![/B][/font][/size]
Now with SoF! [IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/sof.gif[/img]
[IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/pictures.png[/img]
[IMG]https://dl.dropbox.com/u/52684611/imgs/Ad%201_550x308.png[/img]

item.title: Revision-X: The most unique server here!
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Impossible to use a cheat client / get an unfair advantage?

HA!

You wish it was impossible, there is nothing, absolutely nothing, you can do in or with the client to protect your server. When writing a public server, you can NEVER trust the client. The most you can do is make sure that on your server, you verify that every bit of information the client sends to you is perfectly valid before acting on it.

Read full topic
item.source: Revision-X: The most unique server here!
